com.github.deltaspikedbunit.dbunit

Class DbUnitTestRule

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.deltaspikedbunit.dbunit.DbUnitTestRule
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.junit.rules.TestRule

    public class DbUnitTestRule
extends Object
implements org.junit.rules.TestRule
    JUnit rule to:
    • set up a database before test execution through DatabaseSetup
    • verify database content after test execution through ExpectedDatabase
    • leave a database in a known state after test execution through DatabaseTearDown
    This is meant to replace DatabaseTest and DatabaseNoRollbackTest when a test cannot run in the same transaction, or only just wrapped by the same interceptor. NOTE: this uses a separate connection (and transaction), from the one used by the test itself for setup, tear down and checking expected database state. I consider it experimental for now, even if it works in my tests.
    Author:
    Luigi Bitonti
